description: This product is a tetramer of biotinylated peptide/MHC complex with streptavidin mainly composed of MCMV-derived peptide of HGIRNASFI sequence covering 985-993 and H-2Db molecule. The pMHC tetramer recognizes mouse CD8 T cells, and can be used in the analysis of individual antigen-specific T cells.
name: H-2DbMCMV M45 HGIRNASFI MHC Tetramer
